17using UnityEngine;
18using System.Collections;
19
20namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
21{
25 public class PatientShowCopyToggle : MonoBehaviour
26 {
27 [HideInInspector]
28 public GameObject patientModel;
29 public GameObject playerHead;
30 protected GameObject copy;
34 private bool buttonPressDisabled = false;
38 private float disableTime = 0.1f;
39
44 void OnTriggerEnter(Collider other)
45 {
46 if (buttonPressDisabled) return;
47 buttonPressDisabled = true;
48 }
49
54 void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
55 {
56 if (!buttonPressDisabled) return;
57
58 executeAction();
59 GetComponentInParent<VRUIToggle>().Toggle();
60
61 StartCoroutine(EnableAfterSeconds());
62 }
63
68 IEnumerator EnableAfterSeconds()
69 {
70 yield return new WaitForSeconds(disableTime);
71 buttonPressDisabled = false;
72 }
73
77 private void executeAction()
78 {
79 if (copy == null) return;
80
81 copy.SetActive(!copy.activeInHierarchy);
82 if (!copy.activeInHierarchy) return;
83
84 Vector3 spawnPos = playerHead.transform.position;
85
86 copy.transform.position = spawnPos + playerHead.transform.forward;
87 copy.transform.LookAt(spawnPos);
88 }
89
93 public void Reload()
94 {
95 GameObject target = FindObjectOfType<CaseController>().loadedPatient;
96 if (target == null) return;
97
98 if (copy != null) {
99 Destroy(copy);
100 }
101
102 copy = Instantiate(target, transform.position, transform.rotation);
103 copy.SetActive(false);
104 }
105 }
106}
